benchmark_details.name: How Social Is It (HSII)
benchmark_details.overview: HSII is designed to assess LLMâ€™s social capabilities in comprehensive social agent tasks and benchmark representative models through a structured evaluation that includes format parsing, target selection, target switching conversation, and stable conversation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To effectively evaluate the social communication capabilities of LLMs within multi-user, multi-turn real-world social contexts.

data.source: Derived from news datasets, manually curated and filtered to create realistic social scenarios.
data.annotation: Manually reviewed and filtered by human evaluators.

methodology.calculation: The HSII score combines several stages of evaluation including target selection accuracy and dialogue engagement over multi-turn interactions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher HSII scores indicate better capability in navigating complex social interactions.
